jobInfo.Jobdescription:
Qualifications:

· 

·  Good knowledge of Service Now Basics and configurations

·  Knowledge and working experience on Javascript, Client and Server side scripting – Business rules, Script Includes, UI Actions, UI Policies, and Data Policies – all scripted aspects of the Service Now system.

·  Knowledge and working experience of UI interfaces within Service Now – Service Portal, CMS, Native – UI pages, UI Macros, CSS, HTML, Angular JS.

·  Excellent debugging and problem-solving skills

·  Excellent communication, presentation, listening, and negotiation skills

·  Strong customer service mindset

·  Ability to multi-task and work with management to prioritize tasks.

·  Good troubleshooting skills with the ability to assist in determining the root cause of problems, and offer recommendations or suggestions for a quick, but effective, resolution.

·  Willingness to work in Shifts
jobInfo.Qualification: Graduate or Post graduate in Science and Engineering Streams
jobInfo.Specialization:
o Testing and debugging skills on the ServiceNow platform
o ServiceNow modules customization
o ServiceNow instance integrations using REST/SOAP APIs
o Hands-on writing of advanced & complex scripts
o Must have integration, service portal working experience
o Track and respond to the emails submitted to helpdesk queue
